# HV_CAP_VCPUMAX

**Global Variable**

A value that indicates the maximum number of available vCPUs.

## Declaration

```swift
var HV_CAP_VCPUMAX: Int { get }
```

## Capabilities

- **HV_CAP_ADDRSPACEMAX**: A value that indicates the maximum number of available address spaces.

items.description: A value that indicates the maximum number of available address spaces.
